players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I am shocked that Alice was killed last night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafia quickly."
Diana: "I agree, Charlie. Since Alice was killed, the mafia is clearly active. We should all share our thoughts and voting intentions openly."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of someone more suspicious? This seems like a risky claim."
Charlie: "Bob’s claim seems very convenient and could be an attempt to frame me early on. Diana makes a good point—why would he waste his investigation on me first?"
You: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Charlie is mafia. Diana, if you vote with Charlie, you're helping mafia win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
